title: XBMC KODI 16 ( with add-ons) By CodeMonkey
description:
[img]<center>http://i.imgur.com/S2nMNXl.jpg?1</center>[/img]

XBMC KODI 16 ( with add-ons) By CodeMonkey
-------------------------------------------

What is KODI?
KODI is a free media center software (open source)!!
With this revolutionary software you can watch movies, TV shows, sports, music.. online TV and HQ radio stations from all around the world with many languages ... anywhere for free . Also you can make your own media library very easily and in a friendly way.

This Installer has an (all-in-one-installer), Which includes the most recent KODI with the latest and most popular add-ons such as:
		
- 1Channel, Genesis, Channel PEAR, NaviX, Castaway, Phoenix, Icefilm, SportDevil ... and more. 

It's been created to make installing KODI with add-ons as simple as possible.

-------------------------------------------
XBMC KODI system requirements:

- OS minimum : Windows vista / windows 7 / windows 8. windows 10
- For end-users the recommended minimum requirement is a 32bit or 64bit (Intel/AMD) processor with a   graphic adapter that supports DirectX version 9.0c and good internet connection.

Video card:

- ATI/AMD, Intel, or NVIDIA graphic controller.
- ATI Radeon R420 (X800) or newer supported, ATI Radeon R700 (HD 4000) or newer recommended.
- Intel GMA 950 (945G) or newer supported, Intel GMA X4500HD (G45) or newer recommended.
- NVIDIA GeForce 6-Series and newer supported, GeForce 8-Series and newer recommended.

-------------------------------------------

This file contains:

- XBMC KODI 16 Jarvis 

- Add-ons auto installer

- XBMC KODI 16 (with add-ons) By CodeMonkey install video

-------------------------------------------

How to install:

Just refer to the included 'Kodi 16 Install Video' for install instructions.


 Enjoy

CodeMonkey
